mapper.select: SELECT t.id, t.contract_id contractId, t.contract_no contractNo, t.acc_no accNo, t.mortgagee_acc_no mortgageeAccNo, t.create_time createTime, t.modify_time modifyTime, t.serial_number serialNumber, t.accounting_no accountingNo, t.contract_no contractNo, t.loan_platform loanPlatform, t.result result FROM t_gq_fss_enter_account t where t.parent_id=#{parentId}
